name: Eero Saarinen Womb Chair and Ottoman in New Zealand Taupe Sheepskin

condition.details:
Refinished. Replacements made: Our team of expert upholsterers replaced the previous seat foam for both chair and ottoman with a 100% feather insert. 
The chair also received a complete foam replacement from the back to the sides. Reupholstered.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Relax and unwind in this beautifully comfortable original Eero Saarinen Womb Chair and ottoman set. The chair is accompanied by an ottoman of which both are fully reupholstered in high grade New Zealand sheepskin. Fully reupholstered with a new combination feather and foam insert. The ottoman measurements are 23in. in depth, 27in. in width, and 19in. in height. This chair is the perfect addition to an office, study, or parlor room. The wooly sheepskin is so plush and fluffy, making it perfect for cozying up on a cool winter day.
